variables.input:
fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
| fields cluster = entity.name
| sort cluster asc
//| fields values = arrayRemoveNulls(array("ALL", cluster))

fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster)
| filter isNotNull(k8s.namespace.name)
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
         | fields name=entity.name, id=id], 
           sourceField:dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster, lookupField:id ,prefix:"lookup.cluster_"
| filter in(lookup.cluster_name, array($Cluster))
// | filter in($Cluster, "ALL") OR 
//          in(lookup.cluster_name, $Cluster)
| fields k8s.namespace.name
| summarize distinctNamespaces = collectDistinct(k8s.namespace.name)
| expand distinctNamespaces
| sort distinctNamespaces asc
| fields values = arrayRemoveNulls(array("ALL", distinctNamespaces))

fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster)
| filter isNotNull(k8s.namespace.name)
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
         | fields name=entity.name, id=id], 
           sourceField:dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster, lookupField:id ,prefix:"lookup.cluster_"
| filter in($Cluster, "ALL") OR 
         in(lookup.cluster_name, array($Cluster))
| filter in($Namespace, "ALL") OR 
         in(k8s.namespace.name, array($Namespace))
| fields k8s.pod.name
| summarize distinctPods = collectDistinct(k8s.pod.name)
| expand distinctPods
| sort distinctPods asc
| fields values = arrayRemoveNulls(array("ALL", distinctPods))

fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster)
| filter isNotNull(k8s.namespace.name)
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
         | fields name=entity.name, id=id], 
           sourceField:dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster, lookupField:id ,prefix:"lookup.cluster_"
| filter in($Cluster, "ALL") OR 
         in(lookup.cluster_name, array($Cluster))
| filter in($Namespace, "ALL") OR 
         in(k8s.namespace.name, array($Namespace))
| filter in($Pod, "ALL") OR 
         in(k8s.pod.name, array($Pod))
| fields status
| summarize distinctStatus = collectDistinct(status)
| expand distinctStatus
| sort distinctStatus asc
| fields values = arrayRemoveNulls(array("ALL", distinctStatus))

0.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster)
| filter isNotNull(k8s.namespace.name)
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
         | fields name=entity.name, id=id], 
           sourceField:dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster, lookupField:id ,prefix:"lookup.cluster_"
| filter in($Cluster, "ALL") OR 
         in(lookup.cluster_name, array($Cluster))
| filter in($Namespace, "ALL") OR 
         in(k8s.namespace.name, array($Namespace))
| filter in($Pod, "ALL") OR 
         in(k8s.pod.name, array($Pod))       
| makeTimeseries sparkline = count()
| fieldsAdd  singlevalue = arraySum(sparkline)

1.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster)
| filter isNotNull(k8s.namespace.name)
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
         | fields name=entity.name, id=id], 
           sourceField:dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster, lookupField:id ,prefix:"lookup.cluster_"
| filter in($Cluster, "ALL") OR 
         in(lookup.cluster_name, array($Cluster))
| filter in($Namespace, "ALL") OR 
         in(k8s.namespace.name, array($Namespace))
| filter in($Pod, "ALL") OR 
         in(k8s.pod.name, array($Pod))
| makeTimeseries total = count(),
                 error = countIf(status == "ERROR")
| fieldsAdd  singlevalue = arraySUM(error)

2.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster)
| filter isNotNull(k8s.namespace.name)
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
         | fields name=entity.name, id=id], 
           sourceField:dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster, lookupField:id ,prefix:"lookup.cluster_"
| filter in($Cluster, "ALL") OR 
         in(lookup.cluster_name, array($Cluster))
| filter in($Namespace, "ALL") OR 
         in(k8s.namespace.name, array($Namespace))
| filter in($Pod, "ALL") OR 
         in(k8s.pod.name, array($Pod))
| makeTimeseries total = count(),
                 error = countIf(status == "ERROR")
| fieldsAdd  sparkline = (toDouble(error[]) / toDouble(total[]) * 100)
| fieldsAdd  singlevalue = arrayAvg(sparkline)

3.title: Status Summary
3.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster)
| filter isNotNull(k8s.namespace.name)
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
         | fields name=entity.name, id=id], 
           sourceField:dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster, lookupField:id ,prefix:"lookup.cluster_"
| filter in($Cluster, "ALL") OR 
         in(lookup.cluster_name, array($Cluster))
| filter in($Namespace, "ALL") OR 
         in(k8s.namespace.name, array($Namespace))
| filter in($Pod, "ALL") OR 
         in(k8s.pod.name, array($Pod))
| summarize  count = count(), 
                 by:{status}

4.title: Status History
4.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster)
| filter isNotNull(k8s.namespace.name)
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
         | fields name=entity.name, id=id], 
           sourceField:dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster, lookupField:id ,prefix:"lookup.cluster_"
| filter in($Cluster, "ALL") OR 
         in(lookup.cluster_name, $Cluster)
| filter in($Namespace, "ALL") OR 
         in(k8s.namespace.name, $Namespace)
| filter in($Pod, "ALL") OR 
         in(k8s.pod.name, $Pod)
| makeTimeseries chart = count(), 
                 by:{status}

5.title: Log Lines --> Cluster = $Cluster & Namespace = $Namespace & POD = $Pod & Status = $Status & LogLines = $LogLines
5.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster)
| filter isNotNull(k8s.namespace.name)
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
         | fields name=entity.name, id=id], 
           sourceField:dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster, lookupField:id ,prefix:"lookup.cluster_"
| filter in($Cluster, "ALL") OR 
         in(lookup.cluster_name, array($Cluster))
| filter in($Namespace, "ALL") OR 
         in(k8s.namespace.name, array($Namespace))
| filter in($Pod, "ALL") OR 
         in(k8s.pod.name, array($Pod))
| filter in($Status, "ALL") OR 
         in(status,array($Status))
| fieldsAdd trace = if(isNotNull(trace_id),"TraceAvailable",
                    else: "NoTraceAvailable")
| filter in($LogLines, "ALL") OR 
         in(trace,$LogLines)
| sort timestamp desc
// | fieldsAdd  status = if((status == "NONE"), " ðŸŸª NONE",
//                  else:if((status == "INFO"), " ðŸŸ¦ INFO",
//                  else:if((status == "WARN"), " ðŸŸ§ WARN",
//                  else:if((status == "ERROR"), " ðŸŸ¥ ERROR"
//                  ))))
| fields status,
         timestamp,
         trace_id = if(isNotNull(trace_id), trace_id, 
                    else:"No Trace Avaiable"),
         loglevel,
         content,
         pod = k8s.pod.name,
         namespace = k8s.namespace.name,
         cluster = lookup.cluster_name,
         k8s.node = host.name
| limit 1000

7.title: Total by Pod
7.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster)
| filter isNotNull(k8s.namespace.name)
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
         | fields name=entity.name, id=id], 
           sourceField:dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster, lookupField:id ,prefix:"lookup.cluster_"
| filter in($Cluster, "ALL") OR 
         in(lookup.cluster_name, array($Cluster))
| filter in($Namespace, "ALL") OR 
         in(k8s.namespace.name, array($Namespace))
| filter in($Pod, "ALL") OR 
         in(k8s.pod.name, array($Pod))
| summarize count = count(), 
            by:{pod = k8s.pod.name,                
                namespace = k8s.namespace.name}
| fields count, 
         pod,
         namespace
| sort count desc
| limit 100

8.title: Errors by Pod
8.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster)
| filter isNotNull(k8s.namespace.name)
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
         | fields name=entity.name, id=id], 
           sourceField:dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster, lookupField:id ,prefix:"lookup.cluster_"
| filter in($Cluster, "ALL") OR 
         in(lookup.cluster_name, array($Cluster))
| filter in($Namespace, "ALL") OR 
         in(k8s.namespace.name, array($Namespace))
| filter in($Pod, "ALL") OR 
         in(k8s.pod.name, array($Pod))
| summarize total = count(),
            error = countIf(status == "ERROR"),
            by:{pod = k8s.pod.name,
                namespace =k8s.namespace.name}
| fields count = error, 
         pod,
         namespace
| sort count desc
| limit 100

9.title: ErrorRate by Pod
9.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster)
| filter isNotNull(k8s.namespace.name)
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
         | fields name=entity.name, id=id], 
           sourceField:dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster, lookupField:id ,prefix:"lookup.cluster_"
| filter in($Cluster, "ALL") OR 
         in(lookup.cluster_name, array($Cluster))
| filter in($Namespace, "ALL") OR 
         in(k8s.namespace.name, array($Namespace))
| filter in($Pod, "ALL") OR 
         in(k8s.pod.name, array($Pod))
| summarize {total = count(),
            error = countIf(status == "ERROR")}, 
            by:{pod = k8s.pod.name,
                namespace = k8s.namespace.name}
| fieldsAdd  errorRate = (toDouble(error) / toDouble(total) * 100)
| fields errorRate,
         pod,
         namespace
| sort errorRate desc
| limit 100

11.title: Errors by Pod
11.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster)
| filter isNotNull(k8s.namespace.name)
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
         | fields name=entity.name, id=id], 
           sourceField:dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster, lookupField:id ,prefix:"lookup.cluster_"
| filter in($Cluster, "ALL") OR 
         in(lookup.cluster_name, array($Cluster))
| filter in($Namespace, "ALL") OR 
         in(k8s.namespace.name, array($Namespace))
| filter in($Pod, "ALL") OR 
         in(k8s.pod.name, array($Pod))
| makeTimeseries error = countIf(status == "ERROR"),
                 by:{k8s.pod = k8s.pod.name,
                     k8s.namespace = k8s.namespace.name}

12.title: Total by Pod
12.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster)
| filter isNotNull(k8s.namespace.name)
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
         | fields name=entity.name, id=id], 
           sourceField:dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster, lookupField:id ,prefix:"lookup.cluster_"
| filter in($Cluster, "ALL") OR 
         in(lookup.cluster_name, array($Cluster))
| filter in($Namespace, "ALL") OR 
         in(k8s.namespace.name, array($Namespace))
| filter in($Pod, "ALL") OR 
         in(k8s.pod.name, array($Pod))
| makeTimeseries count = count(), 
                 by:{k8s.pod = k8s.pod.name,

13.title: ErrorRate by Pod
13.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster)
| filter isNotNull(k8s.namespace.name)
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
         | fields name=entity.name, id=id], 
           sourceField:dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster, lookupField:id ,prefix:"lookup.cluster_"
| filter in($Cluster, "ALL") OR 
         in(lookup.cluster_name, array($Cluster))
| filter in($Namespace, "ALL") OR 
         in(k8s.namespace.name, array($Namespace))
| filter in($Pod, "ALL") OR 
         in(k8s.pod.name, array($Pod))
| makeTimeseries {total = count(),
                  error = countIf(status == "ERROR")}, 
                  by:{k8s.pod = k8s.pod.name,
                      k8s.namespace = k8s.namespace.name}
| fieldsAdd  errorRate = (toDouble(error[]) / toDouble(total[]) * 100)
| fields timeframe, 
         interval, 
         k8s.pod,
         k8s.namespace,
         errorRate

15.query:
data record(Status = "ERROR", LogLevels = "SEVERE, ERROR, CRITICAL, ALERT, FATAL, EMERGENCY"),
     record(Status = "WARN", LogLevels = "WARN"),
     record(Status = "INFO", LogLevels = "INFO, TRACE, DEBUG, NOTICE"),
     record(Status = "NONE", LogLevels = "NONE")
